DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized controlled trial 48 students were randomly allocated in three groups SCIM, Video training (VT) and control group(no training). They had a workshops based on NRP and lasted 6 hours for each group. Before and after the workshops and one month later all students participated in a 7 station OSCE..
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of SCIM on Neonatal Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: healthy, without any history of severe stress in the past 6 months prior to the study. Accepts Healthy Volunteers severe stress
